title: The Wizard's Daughter
resume: This lakorn is a remake of various classics, set at the beginning of World War II during Japanese occupation of Thailand. Enemies becoming friends and tells the story of a Japanese soldier who falls for a Thai girl and how love can even overcome the boundaries of war. This story also has a supernatural aspect that makes for exciting viewing.
